document_data.name: Rary's Superior Spell Enhancer
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rary's superior spell enhancer''''' was a more powerful version of ''[[Rary's spell enhancer]]''.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this [[spell]] increased the damage inflicted by another spell. It allowed the caster to cast two spells at the same time, first this spell and then the spell that the caster wished to modify.
document_data.Casting: This spell required only a [[verbal]] component.
document_data.History: This spell was known to be used by wizards of the [[Cult of the Dragon]].
